spec_data.Name: flatpak-rpm-macros
spec_data.Description:
The macros in this package set up the RPM build environment so built
applications install in /app rather than /usr. This package is meant
only for installation in buildroots for modules that will be packaged
as Flatpaks.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 07 Aug 2017 01:31:06 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Macros for building RPMS for flatpaks
